definition: The simulated fees paid node allows setting a specific fee for the simulation of each order, overriding the fee structure parameter of the trading session.

paragraphs.text: How the Simulated Fees Paid Works

The fee structure parameter of the trading session allows setting a blanket fee structure (maker and taker) for all orders in the trading system. The simulated fees paid node allows control on a per-order basis, so each order may be simulated with a specific fee.
If the node is not present or the parameter is undefined, the fee structure parameter set up for the trading session is used.
To add the simulated fees paid node, select Add Missing Items on the parent node menu.
To configure the simulated fees paid node, select Configure on the menu.
percentage is the percentage to be applied to calculate the fees for the specific order.
